subject: [Mhln] Special offer from our store
body:
Dear customer.
Various medical associations warn us about the growing problem of drug falsification. If you want to know how to avoid being sold fake medications, red this letter to the end.
The list of medications prescribed by your therapist is big enough to make you go bankrupt? Visit CanadianPharmacy - #1 discount Canadian pharmacy and purchase all the medications you need at a price much lower than that in any licensed USA pharmacy. CanadianPharmacy real generic quality at best prices.
CanadianPharmacy the best that modern medicine can offer you, plus the best Canadian prices.
Sincerely yours,Phyllis Noble
